lfsom.visualization.clustering

Class LFSKMeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • lfsom.visualization.clustering.LFSKMeans

  • public class LFSKMeans
extends java.lang.Object
    Pretty much the classic K-Means clustering. Tried to keep it simple, though.
    Version:
    $Id: KMeans.java 3921 2010-11-05 12:54:53Z mayer $
    Author:
    Robert Neumayer

      • LFSKMeans

        public LFSKMeans(int k,
         double[][] data)
        Default constructor (as much defaulting as possible). Uses linear initialisation and Euclidean distance.
        Parameters:
        k - number of clusters
        data - guess

        public void setClusterCentroids(double[][] centroids)
                         throws at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.visualization.clustering.MoreCentresThanKException
        Initialise the cluster centres with the given centres.
        Parameters:
        centroids - centroids for clusters.
        Throws:
        at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.visualization.clustering.MoreCentresThanKException - don't dare to set more or less centres than our k value.
